document_notes.text:
This update for djvulibre fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-3500: Stack overflow in function DJVU:DjVuDocument:get_djvu_file() via crafted djvu file (bsc#1186253)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: A flaw was found in djvulibre-3.5.28 and earlier. A Stack overflow in function DJVU::DjVuDocument::get_djvu_file() via crafted djvu file may lead to application crash and other consequences.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
